about_the_game:
PSI is an immersive first-person shooter that blends environmental storytelling with early 2000s level design, all while delivering a chilling sense of isolation.

In this world, massive underground steam turbines power the world using coal and water deposits. Amidst a crippling financial crisis that threatens to engulf the nation, the government recruits you as the Overseer of the California Steam Turbine Network. Four months after your training, an unexpected pressure surge within the turbine core sends you on a mission to clear the blockage before the system succumbs to catastrophic overload. 

FEATURES


  • Campaign
  • Secret Weapons
  • Secret Areas
  • Pressure Based Puzzles
  • Semi-Linear Level Design
  • Environmental Storytelling
  • World UI
  • Dynamic Distance Based Crosshair

short_description: Civilization has never evolved past steam energy. A series of poorly maintained steam turbines keep society from collapse. An unexpected pressure buildup in the Turbine Core sends you on a adventure through the poorly maintained infrastructure.
